translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺らは周りに恵まれた」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We were blessed with the people around us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、立派な人間になれたとは思えないが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't think we've become respectable people now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがにあの頃よりはマシだろうからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but surely we're better than we were back then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二人揃って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The two of us together,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に馬鹿だったからなあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were really foolish, after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それ見てケツ叩いてくれた奴らがいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There were people who saw that and gave us a kick in the ass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけでもありがてぇし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That alone I'm thankful for,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 感謝してもし足りねえな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I can't thank them enough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、少しでも報いてやれるようにならんとな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, we have to become able to repay them, even if just a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンが自身の巨大な手の平を見て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton looked at his own gigantic palm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強く握りしめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and clenched his fist tightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もらったもんや、託されたもんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The things we've received and entrusted to us

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多すぎるが……一つ一つ、よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are too many... but we’ll handle them one by one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、そうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, that's right."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで二人は息を抜いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There they both let out a breath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふう、しかし恩を返してやりたい奴が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew, but I regret that almost everyone I want to repay

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど死んじまったのが悔やまれるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has already passed away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんな馬鹿を慕って逝っちまった奴、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those who cared for fools like us and passed on,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死をもって何かを教えてくれた奴、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: those who taught us something through their death,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後の最後、その手前で……とかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and some who passed just before reaching the very end... stuff like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こればっかりは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしようもなく、後悔しちまうな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t help but feel regret..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後ろばっか見てたらまた怒られちまわぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we keep looking back, we'll get scolded again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今後は、そんなことないようにしねぇと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to make sure that doesn’t happen from now on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「感謝してる奴には変に気取らず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To those we are grateful to, without acting oddly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日頃からそれを伝えるくらいは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we should at least convey that regularly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しようかね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's do that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　あんたらだけ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Is it just you two?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むさい二人が顔突き合わしてなんの相談中？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you two rough guys secretly discussing with your faces so close?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なにさ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人してジッと見ちゃって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both of you staring so intently..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よっしゃ、ハンティ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, Hanty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 茶ァ淹れてやるよ、飲むだろ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll make some tea for you, you want some, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、それとも酒にすっか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or would you prefer some alcohol instead?"
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「肩のそれ、いつもつけてちゃ肩が凝るだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That thing on your shoulder must get stiff from always wearing it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまには肩でも揉んでやろうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How about I give your shoulder a massage for once?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょ、ちょっとちょっと！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-hey, wait, wait!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、二人揃って気持ち悪い……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You two together are so gross..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいからいいから、遠慮すんなって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s fine, it’s fine, don’t hold back."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうそう、普段世話になってんだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, yeah, you usually take care of us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまには恩返しさせてくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so let us repay you once in a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこでハッと気づいたハンティが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Hanty suddenly realized,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きゅっと眉を吊り上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and furrowed his brows tightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんた達……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You guys..."
"Hm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回はどんな悪さをしたの？　言ってみ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of mischief did you get into this time? Tell me."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいからいいから、遠慮すんなって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s fine, it’s fine, don’t hold back."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうそう、普段世話になってんだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, yeah, you usually take care of us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまには恩返しさせてくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so let us repay you once in a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこでハッと気づいたハンティが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Hanty suddenly realized,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きゅっと眉を吊り上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and furrowed his brows tightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんた達……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You guys..."
"Hm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回はどんな悪さをしたの？　言ってみ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of mischief did you get into this time? Tell me."
